title: The Perfect.... Hell
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>It’s finally done, huh.... Kanan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah~. All the time we spent thinking about it paid off.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>We were even able to put plenty of each other’s favorites into it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeap. Oceans are a fundamental part of a triathlon, but to put in mountain activities as well? You’re a genius, Umi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s because I’ve always found it difficult to prepare enough bicycles for everyone every time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You’re right. This way we don’t even need to prepare them. Maaan~, mountains are amazing. I take back everything I said!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>The ocean is quite incredible too. Just being in it can turn into an exercise.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hey, what should we name this triathlon?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Let’s see.... I don’t know why everyone calls it the “Hell Triathlon”.... But the word “hell” would intimidate people.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmm~, then.... how about the “Triathlon to Heaven”!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
